sentences.sContent: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.sCn: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.sContent: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.sCn: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.sContent: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.sCn: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

sentences.sContent: ...It is really an honor for me to be your friend and I will cherish the goodwill you have showed to me wherever I go...
...The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home...
...A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/nursing home near my town...
...A friend told me the following story...
...Ryan saw that his friend Tyler had brought lunch from home...
...If you tell your dim friend that he has the potential of an Einstein...
...A hand-written note to a friend or a family member is the best way to communicate important thoughts...
...my friend Denny and I went to the Graben Gore Restaurant to have a hot dog...
...What does the speaker tell us about her friend Leo...
...My friend Leo makes up weak and poor excuses whenever there is something he doesn't want to do...

words.tran: 友好的；亲切的；支持的；融洽的，和睦的
没有朋友的；无依无靠的；孤单的

trans.tranOther: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with
